briefTitle: Survival Monitoring in Russian Cancer Registries
officialTitle: Survival Monitoring in Russian Cancer Registries
conditions: Melanoma, Breast Cancer, Oncology, Colon Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Survivorship, Lung Cancer, Cervix Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Men and women of any age
* Data record meets IARC/IACR Tools for Cancer Registries requirements

Exclusion Criteria:

* Severe patient data missing from a record
